Type.Name: TreeCellDataFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TreeCellDataFunc(TreeViewColumn tree_column, CellRenderer cell, ITreeModel tree_model, TreeIter iter);
.class public auto ansi sealed TreeCellDataFunc extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A delegate for methods that handle tree cell data.
Docs.remarks: Methods with this shape are used to specify how to fill in tree data; see for example for one place where this class is used as a parameter.
